name: Local Interactive LLC
description:
Local Interactive is a full service digital advertising agency. We specialize in partnering with small to medium sized businesses & online entrepreneurs looking to dominate thier online market space
Our mission is to partner with you the business owner and provide you with the knowledge, technology and resources needed to develop, manage and implement a successfully and profitable internet marketing campaign.
We are not the largest agency in the country; nor do we have dozens of sales people trying to sell you something different every month. We are a small firm of dedicated internet marketing specialist, who are passionate about providing professional search engine marketing services. Our goal is to form a long-term relationship with you that will increase your businesses profits and sustain that growth over the life of our relationship.
 
This philosophy ensures that at the end of the day, our success is measured by the results we deliver to our clients.
